stepAnswer: At 12:30pm, the volume in the tank is decreasing at a rate of 20 gallons per minute.
stepTitle: Given the volume f(t) of a tank of gasoline, in gallons, $$t$$ minutes after noon, explain the meaning of $$f'(30)=-20$$ in words.
answerLatex: At 12:30pm, the volume in the tank is decreasing at a rate of $$20$$ gallons per minute.
